item.description:
I just realized that there's no homework and no soccer practice tonight.
Bonus, it's ladies night for the moms and daughters.

Parents can belay for each other while the kids climb with the auto belay or in the bouldering cave.

Please come and join me and my 3rd grade son for an evening of climbing. Feel free to join us later if 6:30 is too early.

P.S. We're stopping at Tudo Na Brasa Brazilian BBQ in Woburn for dinner at 5:30pm.

We'll meet in the room with the benches. If you come later, find us most likely in the Main room. I'm easy to spot ;-)
item.how_to_find_us: Look in the room with the benches, then later in the main room. I look like my photo.
item.name: Climbing with kids + Ladies night at BRG - Tonight 11/10/2010
